user.forms module

class user.forms.UserRegistrationForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

Form for registering a new user.

Inherits from Django’s built-in UserCreationForm and specifies the User model along with the fields to include in the form: ‘username’, ‘password1’, and ‘password2’ for password confirmation.

Meta[source]

Contains metadata for the form including the model and fields to use.

Type:

class

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

user.views.register(request)[source]

Handles user registration.

If the request method is POST, it processes the submitted form, validates it, saves the new user, and shows a success message. Redirects the user to the login page on successful registration. If the request method is GET, displays a blank registration form.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered registration form template with context.

Return type:

HttpResponse
